definitions.definition: To fill with wonder and surprise; to astonish, astound, surprise or perplex.
definitions.example: He was amazed when he found that the girl was a robot.

definitions.definition: To undergo amazement; to be astounded.
To bewilder; to stupefy; to bring into a maze.
To terrify, to fill with panic.
Astonished; confounded with fear, surprise, or wonder; greatly surprised. The following adposition may be: at, with or by.
